description: For [C0021](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0021), the threat actors used [Cobalt Strike](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0154) configured with a modified variation of the publicly available Pandora Malleable C2 Profile.(Citation: FireEye APT29 Nov 2018)(Citation: Microsoft Unidentified Dec 2018)

external_references.description: Dunwoody, M., et al. (2018, November 19). Not So Cozy: An Uncomfortable Examination of a Suspected APT29 Phishing Campaign. Retrieved November 27, 2018.
Microsoft Defender Research Team. (2018, December 3). Analysis of cyberattack on U.S. think tanks, non-profits, public sector by unidentified attackers. Retrieved April 15, 2019.
